Multivariate regression with covariance estimate (precomputed matrices)

compute_fixed_precomputed.Rd

Usage

compute_fixed_precomputed(
  xtx,
  xtyom,
  tolmult,
  n,
  p,
  q,
  lam2,
  Omega,
  tol.in,
  maxit.in,
  silent,
  B0 = NULL,
  mx,
  my
)

Arguments

xtx

matrix, precomputed crossprod(X) after centering

xtyom

matrix, precomputed crossprod(X,Y)

tolmultnumeric, precomputed sum(crossprod(Y)*Omega) for tolerance scaling

nint, number of samples

pint, number of SNPs

qint, number of isoforms

lam2numeric, lambda penalty for LASSO

Omegamatrix, precision matrix of Y

tol.innumeric, tolerance for objective difference

maxit.inint, maximum number of iterations

silentlogical

B0matrix, initial coefficient matrix for warm starts (NULL for zeros)

mxvector, precomputed column means of X

myvector, precomputed column means of Y

list of MRCE estimates Optimized version that accepts precomputed XtX and XtY*Omega matrices to avoid redundant computation in cross-validation loops.
